entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over the Highlands. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
